channel.title: RelectaRSPS 508 The New Standard In Rsps
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]RelectaRSPS[/size][/center] [center][size=12pt]RelectaRSPS is a new and amazing server that will make you wonder why rsps hasn't always been this good.[/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]All working skills!![/size] [/center] [center][color=orange][size=12pt]This includes a custom dungeoneering with five different floors each with four different complexities![/center]
[color=green][size=12pt][center]Also we have fully working summoning with fully working familiars![/center]
[center]Other Feature We Offer [/center] [center][color=purple][size=10pt]-New and Custom Interfaces -Fully Working Combat System -Custom and Hard to Find Areas -Godwars -::yell Is Not Just A Donor Only Function -All working curses -Working Clan Chats With Ranks[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2qa046u.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/30iyicw.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/zswu9e.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/13zpnrp.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2aam543.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2cz97yo.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2lmtea8.jpg[/img][/center]
[size=14pt][color=yellow][center]So why should you join Relecta?[/center] [size=10pt]We are a unique rsps with everything you can imagine and more. We have multiple areas you can explore that you would never see on any other rsps. With these areas also comes the benefits of killing thousands of monsters all with their own unique drops. We at Relecta wanted to bring the best experience possible to all of our players. In doing this we have done multiple tests on all elements of our server to make it as bug free as can be. Unlike other servers we want to have our players enjoy themselves year round. We will have certain items only obtainable during certain seasons, holidays, etc. This on top of our guaranteed constant updates will keep our players coming back for more. We easily have the most laid back and helpful staff in the rsps community. We pride ourselves in seeing our players enjoy their time here as much as possible. On top of this we are always looking for new and helpful staff but this wont be easy to obtain. So why not come visit us today at Relecta and realize why we will soon be one of the best servers around.[/size]
Click [url=http://Relectarsps.com]Relectarsps.com[/url] to begin your Relecta experience

item.title: RelectaRSPS 508 The New Standard In Rsps
item.dc:creator: @IceKy IceKy
item.description:
@IceKy wrote:

Server has new vps now and even more content update, new boss and bosses are a lot harder, check it out guys!

Read full topic
item.source: RelectaRSPS 508 The New Standard In Rsps

item.title: RelectaRSPS 508 The New Standard In Rsps
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

IceKy:

@3lv3n snip3r But that would just be too much, it’s custom and 508 is in the middle, kind of is the best way to put it no? Well thx for clearing that up. Tried to google to see what are the biggest differences but couldn’t find any good answer :S

You could just say it’s a 317 loading 508+. Also, there is a big difference between 508 and a 317. Go look at pictures of a 508 RSPS or RuneScape and compare them to an actual 317 client.

Read full topic
item.source: RelectaRSPS 508 The New Standard In Rsps

item.title: RelectaRSPS 508 The New Standard In Rsps
item.dc:creator: @relectaRSPS relectaRSPS
item.description:
@relectaRSPS wrote:

The server is not leeched. When we were making the server some of our “friends” leached it so in a fit of rage our other “friend” put it on rune-server. Yes others can have it but we are the ones who made it. However I know no one will believe me so i feel i am just wasting my time.

Read full topic
item.source: RelectaRSPS 508 The New Standard In Rsps

item.title: RelectaRSPS 508 The New Standard In Rsps
item.dc:creator: @firstchoice8 firstchoice8
item.description:
@firstchoice8 wrote:

IceKy:

@3lv3n snip3r But that would just be too much, it’s custom and 508 is in the middle, kind of is the best way to put it no? Well thx for clearing that up. Tried to google to see what are the biggest differences but couldn’t find any good answer :S

It’s 317 loading higher revision content as 3lv3n said, the source is also leeched, the source you used is krithium, if you wanna prove it’s not leeched put screenshots of things that weren’t in krithium, those tele interfaces and custom dung was already there.

Read full topic

item.title: RelectaRSPS 508 The New Standard In Rsps
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“IceKy, post:10, topic:528335”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=647085.msg4354911#msg4354911 date=1377325434]
This isn’t a 508. :palm:
[/quote]

I though it was 508, what is it then , please answer :S[/quote]
This is a 317 loading a higher revision. I’m assuming 508/525 maps, 634 items, characters, 602 animations, gfx, and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: RelectaRSPS 508 The New Standard In Rsps
item.dc:creator: @IceKy IceKy
item.description:
@IceKy wrote:

It’s really great server , started two days ago and been addicted to it :L , the only thing it misses is players , but that’s because it’s only 4 days old, i’m sure that more will join. Check it out guys and PM me ingame or ask in yell for help if you need. IGN:IceKy

Eco is still very fresh and the competition for first 99s and PvM drops and other things is going, i’m sure a lot like that

Read full topic
